name: Robotics Projects by Sanjay and Arvind
body: ### PIX3L PLOTT3R Build a working printer using LEGO MINDSTORMS EV3 and ev3dev. Everything is made of LEGO except the paper and the pen! Project Page ### M3LODY MAK3R Using LEGO MINDSTORMS EV3 and EV3-G code, you can create a robot that combines art, music and robotics. Project Page ### About the Authors These are projects by Sanjay and Arvind Seshan from Pittsburgh, PA, USA. We are two middle schoolers who enjoy programming robots. We are the founders of EV3Lessons.com and members of a FIRST LEGO League Team Not the Droids You Are Looking For. ### Contact Us Have questions, comments or anything to share? Email us at team@droidsrobotics.org. We would love to see photographs if you build one of our robots.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
